txt.en:
'These fools think they drive us from the field of battle? Never!

'Go forth, gather your numbers and find these fools wherever they may be. Slaughter them outright and you will be justly rewarded!'

<rgb=#00FF00>This quest will fail if there are no longer Glory Seeking Free People Players in the Ettenmoors.</rgb>
Return to War-tyrant Akúlhun and brag about the victory you scored this day!
War-tyrant Akúlhun commands you to find glory-seeking Free People and destroy them! He promises a reward for those who take the enemy down.
'Yes, yes... a worthy kill!\n\n'Do not let this go to your head, sluggard.'
Find and defeat a glory-seeking Free Person
Find a Free Person who is seeking glory across the Ettenmoors and slay them in the name of Angmar!\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Only Glory Seeking Free People Players count toward the advance of this quest.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Failure: There are no more available Glory-seekers</rgb>
